cv.intro: Computer Engineering with 4 years + of experience in software development.Dominion of various programming languages, frameworks. Experience in WEB design, machine learning, image processing and development. Work with Data Base handled systems, as well as design, normalization and migration.

I'm a coder who loves to create cool stuff that represents different challenges and learn from them to improve my experience!
